General.Name: Allmed Medical Products Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: Allmed Medical Products Co.,Ltd engages in the manufacture and sale of wound care and nursing material products in China. The company's general wound care products include elastic and adhesive bandage, oil emulsion dressing, xeroform gauze dressing, non-woven and woven gauze swabs, fluffy bandages/sponges, abdominal pads, gauze/non-woven drain sponges, post-op sponges, eye pads, cotton filled exodontia sponges, non-stick pads, gauze balls /nonwoven balls, and petrolatum gauze dressing. It also provides OR/surgery products, including X-ray non-woven swabs, OR towels, laparotomy and neuro sponges, X-ray gauze swabs, and X-ray detectable gauze balls and nonwoven balls; medical kits; and patient care products comprising disposable nursing pads and disposable drapes, as well as particulate respirator. In addition, the company offers dry and wet, and alcohol and makeup remover wipes; surgical gowns, CSR wraps, and medical drapes; and isolation gowns, coverall, surgical cap and bouffant products, and shoe and boot covers. The company also exports its products. Allmed Medical Products Co.,Ltd was founded in 1992 and is based in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China.
General.Address: Taurus Plaza, Block A, Shenzhen, China
